translated: Tom retourna dans sa chambre et s'allongea.

original: I was jealous of you.
translated: J'étais jalouse de vous.

original: I'll send you home in my car.
translated: Je vous amènerai chez vous en voiture.

original: He's started writing a novel.
translated: Il a commencé à écrire un roman.

original: You don't know German, do you?
translated: Tu ne connais pas l'allemand, n'est-ce pas ?

original: It's starting now.
translated: Ça commence.

original: I've never seen you take any notes in class. How do you manage to retain the material so well?
translated: Je ne t'ai jamais vu prendre des notes en classe. Comment fais-tu pour retenir aussi bien la matière ?

original: He's old enough to be her father.
translated: Il est assez vieux pour être son père.

original: Tom leaned on the counter.
translated: Tom se pencha sur le comptoir.

original: I was hidden.
translated: J'étais dissimulée.

original: When will you arrive?
translated: Quand vas-tu arriver ?

original: He is mentally handicapped.
translated: Il est handicapé mental.

original: She had to part with her fur coat.
translated: Elle dut se séparer de son manteau de fourrure.

original: A strong cup of coffee helps me wake up.
translated: Un café fort m'aide à me réveiller.

original: There's a crack in this bowl.
translated: Il y a une fissure dans ce bol.

original: He asked for a cigarette.
translated: Il a demandé une cigarette.

original: Are you sure you don't want coffee?
translated: Es-tu certaine de ne pas vouloir de café ?

original: I have won.
translated: J'ai gagné.

original: Don't gloat.
translated: Ne jubilez pas !

original: People thought that she was dead.
translated: Les gens la croyaient morte.

original: Tell me how to do this.
translated: Dis-moi comment faire.

original: Don't lose your sense of humor.
translated: Ne perdez pas votre sens de l'humour !

original: He chose to take the stairs rather than the elevator.
translated: Il préféra prendre les escaliers plutôt que l'ascenseur.

original: Tom skipped school.
translated: Tom a séché l'école.

original: You have no shame.
translated: Tu es dénuée de honte.

original: It's an attractive price, for this sort of device.
translated: C'est un prix intéressant pour ce genre d'appareil.

original: She unbuckled her belt.
translated: Elle déboucla sa ceinture.

original: This is a big deal.
translated: C'est important.

original: I'm game.
translated: Je suis de la partie.

original: I wanted to discuss this with you yesterday, but you didn't seem to want to listen.
translated: Je voulais en discuter avec toi, hier, mais tu ne semblais pas disposée à écouter.

original: You ought to keep working while you have your health.
translated: Tu devrais continuer à travailler tant que tu as la santé.

original: I think Tom is still alive.
translated: Je pense que Tom est encore en vie.

original: I think the rumor is true.
translated: Je pense que la rumeur est vraie.

original: A small snowball is capable of starting an avalanche.
translated: Une petite boule de neige peut déclencher une avalanche.

original: She is guilty of theft.
translated: Elle est coupable de vol.

original: We went shopping yesterday.
translated: Nous sommes allées faire des emplettes, hier.

original: He was watching television all day.
translated: Il regardait la télé toute la journée.

original: Who is my father?
translated: Qui est mon père ?

original: Go away!
translated: Décampez !

original: All human beings have brains.
translated: Tous les êtres humains sont pourvus de cerveaux.

original: All humans on Earth are descended from a common ancestor.
translated: Tous les humains sur Terre sont issus d'un ancêtre commun.

original: What're you all looking at?
translated: Que regardez-vous ?

original: Tom likes lobster.
translated: Tom aime le homard.

original: Something wrong with that?
translated: Ça ne vous convient pas ?

original: It's as much an art as it is a science.
translated: C'est autant un art qu'une science.

original: The glottis is part of the larynx.
translated: La glotte est un segment du larynx.

original: You only get one life.
translated: On ne vit qu'une fois.

original: I'm dying for a cup of coffee.
translated: Je meurs d'envie d'un café.

original: I don't know what I'm doing yet.
translated: Je ne sais pas encore ce que je fais.

original: For some reason, her husband seemed to dislike that she spoke of me. In truth, she talked too much about me.
translated: Pour quelque raison, son mari semblait ne pas aimer qu'elle parle de moi. En vérité, elle parlait trop à mon propos.

original: What kind of work do you do?
translated: Quelle sorte de travail effectuez-vous ?

original: She only worked for the sake of money.
translated: Elle ne travaillait que pour l'argent.

original: Do you like Indonesian food?
translated: Aimez-vous la cuisine indonésienne ?

original: They're wasting time.
translated: Elles perdent du temps.

original: Without getting up, he dragged his bag across the floor.
translated: Sans se lever, il traîna son sac sur le sol.

original: Tom takes good care of Mary.
translated: Tom prend bien soin de Mary.

original: We're sinking.
translated: Nous coulons.

original: I was too tired to go on working.
translated: J'étais trop fatigué pour continuer à travailler.

original: He sat next to her.
translated: Il s'assit auprès d'elle.

original: Has Tom eaten yet?
translated: Est-ce que Tom a déjà mangé ?

original: It is necessary that you go there at once.
translated: C'est indispensable que tu y ailles tout de suite.

original: Roll down your window.
translated: Abaissez votre fenêtre !

original: This one's no good.
translated: Celle-ci n'est pas bonne.

original: The Aztecs spoke Nahuatl.
translated: Les Aztèques parlaient nahuatl.

original: No baseball player had been as admired as he was.
translated: Aucun joueur de baseball n'avait été aussi admiré que lui.

original: I'm adamant that you should go.
translated: J'insiste que vous devez partir.

original: How about for tomorrow?
translated: Que penses-tu de demain ?

original: Let us start our week.
translated: Commençons notre semaine.

original: That will not do.
translated: Ça ne fera pas le compte.

original: I like your picture.
translated: J'aime ton tableau.

original: Who are you calling stupid?
translated: De qui dis-tu qu'elles sont stupides ?

original: Many people believe acupuncture can cure diseases.
translated: Beaucoup croient que l'acupuncture peut guérir les maladies.

original: I'm looking for my cell phone.
translated: Je cherche mon cellulaire.

original: The soup is too hot.
translated: La soupe est trop chaude.

original: She is as simple as a child.
translated: Elle a l'innocence d'un enfant.

original: The young man knows little of his own country.
translated: Le jeune homme sait peu de choses de son propre pays.

original: Enough!
translated: Il y en a marre.

original: I'm sorry if I disturbed you.
translated: Je suis désolée si je t'ai dérangé.
